name: Connect Animal Relax
description:
Connect Animal Relax - Take care of Pets - Find all matching cute animals. Good for memory training and relaxing in free time. Optional timer lets players relax and play stress-free! With a pet care system, you now can play and take care of cute pets, such as Cooper dog 🐶 and Sugar Pie sheep 🐑.

Features
★ Classic Onet Connect Animal Game
★ Super cute pet care system
★ Cute graphics
★ Simple gameplay easy to play
★ Get help if you get stuck
★ Completely offline
★ Adorable pets, vivid graphics, smooth playing

How to play Connect Animal - Relax?
✓ Remove 2 animals of the same kind which can be connected within 3 lines
✓ Remove all animals to pass the level
✓ When there is no pair on the board, all blocks will be shuffled
